title: A Dramatic Escalation Involving Nuclear War (Ep 1856)
description:
In this episode, I address the dramatic escalation in the Ukraine war that could lead to nuclear war. I also show a teaser clip of our explosive interview with an FBI whistleblower. 

News Picks:


Did the FBI sanitize a report warning about political influence? 


Joe Manchin got played for a fool by liberal democrats.


Banks are participating in the war on the Second Amendment.

That time a Democrat lawyer accused praying Christians of doing a Nazi salute.


Patriot Act: Democrats have wildly flip-flopped on mass surveillance.



What is the DHS doing with your phone?
